column5: Here is a nice largie from the weekend past. I thought the bass would be shallow hiding under cover. However, I caught this one jigging a deep weed edge. She weighed in at 5.4lbs. Can't wait to get out again. Good luck!
No arguement here. Thats a fatty .  Nice fish.
PokerDemon4 thats a nice tank right there.  Please tell me that this fish was not caught at a reservoir that starts with a V?  Chad

It's nice to see largies in Ontario getting to that size. It was depressing to watch the US based fishing shows on TV where they have 8lbs bucket mouths pulled onto the boats and 5 pounders were a minimum.  Nicely done and thanks for sharing.
I can only assume that was an incidental catch?? hahaha  Not bad, for a bass!!  S.

Me and a friend were targeting bass that day. We were fishing a derby at Valen's conservation area. I caught this one after the derby had ended. There are some big bass in there if you know where to look.
